title: Delhi Increases Minimum Wages for Workers Across Skill Categories
summary: The Delhi government has announced a significant increase in minimum wages, with unskilled workers set to receive Rs 18,456 and skilled workers Rs 22,411 per month. This wage revision aims to address rising living costs in the capital region.
content: The Delhi government has implemented a substantial increase in minimum wages across different worker categories. Under the new wage structure, unskilled workers will receive Rs 18,456 per month, while skilled workers' minimum wages have been set at Rs 22,411.\n\nThe wage revision comes as part of the government's efforts to ensure fair compensation for workers in the capital region amid rising living costs. The new rates will be applicable to all workers employed in various sectors within Delhi's jurisdiction.

source.title: Minimum wages hiked in Delhi: Unskilled workers to get Rs 18,456, skilled Rs 22,411
